replies.body:
Thanks guys, found a fix.
For some reason even if I tried repairing, none of the game files were installing. So the launcher worked, but not the actual game.
I copied league of legends from another computer to that computer.

Hey there,

Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, if you're unable to access to launcher to run the repair you'll need to do the following.

* [Download the HRT (Hextech Repair Tool)](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi)
* Run as admin, check the box for force repatch.
* Click start.
Whats happening, you double clicking launcher and its not doing anything or an error??
